original_text: They demolished the sacred stone of Baal and tore down the temple of Baal, and people have used it for a latrine to this day.
korean_text: 바알의 목상을 헐며 바알의 신당을 헐어서 변소를 만들었더니 오늘까지 이르니라

sentences.original_text: They demolished the sacred stone of Baal
and tore down the temple of Baal
and people have used it for a latrine
